mapper.update: update company set see_count = see_count + 1 where id=#{companyId}

SELECT u.id,u.nick_name,u.avatar,u.openid,u.name,u.phone,u.register_type,date_format(u.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as create_time,u.type, c.company_name,c.company_scale,c.company_special,c.company_city,c.company_info,c.company_photo,c.company_addrx,c.company_addry, c.company_addr,c.company_type,c.hot,c.icon,c.company_fu_ze_ren,c.zhi_wu,c.see_count,c.position_count,c.kuaizhao_money,date_format(c.kuaizhao_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as kuaizhao_date FROM users u LEFT JOIN company c ON u.id = c.user_id
u.type =2
AND u.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND u.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
ORDER BY u.create_time DESC
